code:
defmodule Solution do
  @spec maximum_sum_of_heights(max_heights :: [integer]) :: integer
  def maximum_sum_of_heights(max_heights) do
    n = length(max_heights)
    left_heights = Enum.reduce(1..n-1, [Enum.at(max_heights, 0)], fn i, acc ->
      [min(Enum.at(max_heights, i), Enum.at(acc, 0) + 1) | acc]
    end) |> Enum.reverse()
    
    right_heights = Enum.reduce(1..n-1, [Enum.at(max_heights, n-1)], fn i, acc ->
      [min(Enum.at(max_heights, n-i-1), Enum.at(acc, 0) + 1) | acc]
    end)
    
    combined_heights = Enum.zip(left_heights, right_heights)
                        |> Enum.map(fn {left, right} -> min(left, right) end)
    
    Enum.sum(combined_heights)
  end
end
